content.question: The block falls for a time <math alttext="t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, but the string does not completely unwind. What is the change in angular momentum of the pulley-block system from the instant that the block is released from rest until time <math alttext="t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="R times lowercase m sub b times g t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="R times uppercase M g t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="R times, open parenthesis, lowercase m sub b plus uppercase M, close parenthesis, times g t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>M</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="R times lowercase m sub b times g t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
